net.ognyanov.niogram.ast

Class Grammar

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.ognyanov.niogram.ast.GrammarNode
      • net.ognyanov.niogram.ast.Grammar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, TypeNameProvider

    public final class Grammar
extends GrammarNode
implements TypeNameProvider
    The AST node for grammars. The root of the AST. Has a list of nonterminal rules and a list of terminal rules.

    Besides the rule lists has the following own attributes :

    • blocks - A list of of blocks in the grammar.
    • nonProductive - A list of non-productive nonterminal rules.
    • unreachable - A list of nonterminal rules which are not reachable from the start rule.
    • markers - A flag marking whether productivity, reachability and nullability of rules has been calculated.
    • FF - A flag marking whether First/Follow sets have been calculated.
    • FFK - A flag marking whether FirstK/FollowK sets have been calculated.
    • FFKL - A flag marking whether FirstKL/FollowKL sets have been calculated.
    • conflictInfo - A flag marking whether conflict information has been calculated.
    • K - The value of K for FirstK/FollowK sets.
    • KL - The value of K for FirstKL/FollowKL sets.
    Author:
    Nikolay Ognyanov
    See Also:

      • toRailRoadDot

        public String toRailRoadDot()
        Generates a DOT language representation of the railroad diagrams of the grammar rules.

        Note that a DOT language printout of the grammar AST is inherited from GrammarNode (and so is an XML printout).

        Returns:
        dot language description of the railroad diagrams
